title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 53.6 - Report of entering nonemployees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 53.6 - Report of entering nonemployees

State Regulations

The names of persons not employees of the institution who are
allowed to enter shall be ascertained and reported. Persons who are not
employees shall leave the institution through the same entrance by which they
were admitted, and shall be so informed at the time of
admittance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
53.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
